content.body: * python proposal for lazy module loading https://pep-previews--4622.org.readthedocs.build/pep-0810/

m.new_content.body: python proposal for lazy module loading https://pep-previews--4622.org.readthedocs.build/pep-0810/

content.body:
Nice! There was this one before: https://peps.python.org/pep-0690/
which was opt-out instead of opt-in. But was rejected.
This new one being opt-in (if I'm reading correctly) aligns with how we've approached import-defer
content.formatted_body:
Nice! There was this one before: https://peps.python.org/pep-0690/
which was opt-out instead of opt-in. But was rejected.
This new one being opt-in (if I'm reading correctly) aligns with how we've approached import-defer
